mapper.select: select count(*) as count from member
select mem_id as id, pw from member where mem_id = #{search}

select num, id, name, ssn, email, phone, subjs, regdate from (select @rnum := @rnum +1 as num, s.* from (select @rnum := 0) r, student s where name like #{search} )t where num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select id, name, ssn, email, phone, subjs, regdate from student where id = #{search}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_id, name, pw, email, phone, profile, regdate) values (#{id},#{name},#{pw},#{email},#{phone},#{profile},now())
